external_references.source_name: AhnLab Andariel Subgroup of Lazarus June 2018
external_references.description: AhnLab. (2018, June 23). Targeted attacks by Andariel Threat Group,  a subgroup of the Lazarus. Retrieved September 29, 2021.
Jazi, H. (2021, April 19). Lazarus APT conceals malicious code within BMP image to drop its RAT . Retrieved September 29, 2021.

description: [Andariel](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0138) has conducted spearphishing campaigns that included malicious Word or Excel attachments.(Citation: AhnLab Andariel Subgroup of Lazarus June 2018)(Citation: MalwareBytes Lazarus-Andariel Conceals Code April 2021)
